videos.title: From Student to Software Engineer: My Journey
videos.description: A software engineer shares their complete journey from computer science student to landing their first job at a tech company.
videos.speaker: Sarah Chen
videos.transcript: Hi everyone, I'm Sarah and I want to share my journey from being a confused computer science student to landing my dream job at Google. When I started college, I had no idea what software engineering actually involved...

videos.title: Breaking Into Finance: Investment Banking Insights
videos.description: An investment banker discusses the realities of working in finance, including preparation tips and what to expect.
videos.speaker: Michael Rodriguez
videos.transcript: The finance industry can seem intimidating from the outside, but I'm here to break down what it's really like working in investment banking...

videos.title: Motivation Monday: Overcoming Career Setbacks
videos.description: Inspirational talk about bouncing back from career failures and using setbacks as stepping stones to success.
videos.speaker: Dr. Amanda Foster
videos.transcript: Setbacks are not the end of your story - they're plot twists that make your success story even more compelling. Let me share how I turned my biggest career failure into my greatest opportunity...

videos.title: Landing Your First Internship: A Complete Guide
videos.description: Step-by-step guide on how to find, apply for, and secure internships that will boost your career prospects.
videos.speaker: James Park
videos.transcript: Internships are your gateway to the professional world. Here's exactly how to stand out from thousands of other applicants and land that crucial first internship...

videos.title: The Art of Career Pivoting: Changing Industries Successfully
videos.description: Learn how to successfully transition between different industries and leverage transferable skills.
videos.speaker: Lisa Thompson
videos.transcript: I went from practicing law for 8 years to becoming a UX designer at a startup. Here's how I made the transition and what I learned along the way...

videos.title: Medical School to Residency: What They Don't Tell You
videos.description: A resident doctor shares honest insights about medical training, work-life balance, and career expectations.
videos.speaker: Dr. Priya Patel
videos.transcript: Medical school is just the beginning. Let me share what residency is really like and how to prepare mentally and emotionally for this challenging but rewarding journey...

videos.title: Building Your Personal Brand as a Young Professional
videos.description: Learn how to establish and grow your professional presence both online and offline.
videos.speaker: Alex Kim
videos.transcript: Your personal brand is your professional reputation. Here's how to build an authentic brand that opens doors and creates opportunities...

videos.title: Entrepreneurship 101: From Idea to Startup
videos.description: An entrepreneur shares the journey of building a startup from scratch, including common pitfalls and key lessons.
videos.speaker: David Chen
videos.transcript: Starting a business is one of the most challenging yet rewarding experiences. Here's my honest account of building a tech startup from zero to acquisition...

podcasts.title: The Future of Remote Work: Career Implications
podcasts.description: Discussion on how remote work is changing career trajectories and what professionals need to know.
podcasts.speaker: Panel Discussion
podcasts.transcript: Remote work has fundamentally changed how we think about careers. In this panel discussion, we explore what this means for your professional development...

podcasts.title: Study Strategies That Actually Work
podcasts.description: Evidence-based study techniques that can help students excel academically and prepare for their careers.
podcasts.speaker: Dr. Rachel Green
podcasts.transcript: Not all study methods are created equal. Let me share the scientifically-proven techniques that will maximize your learning and retention...
